trans-unit.source: DSC Group Resource
DSC Group Resource
Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
The Group resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to manage local groups on the target node.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 預期狀態設定 (DSC) 的群組資源會提供一個機制，在目標節點管理本機群組。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
Properties
Property
Description
GroupName
The name of the group for which you want to ensure a specific state.
trans-unit.target: 您要確保其特定狀態的群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: Credential
The credentials required to access remote resources.
trans-unit.target: 存取遠端資源時所需的認證。

trans-unit.source: **Note**: This account must have the appropriate Active Directory permissions to add all non-local accounts to the group; otherwise, an error will occur.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：此帳戶必須具有適當的 Active Directory 權限，藉此將所有非本機帳戶加入群組；否則會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Description
The description of the group.
Ensure
Indicates if the group exists.
Set this property to "Absent" to ensure that the group does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性為 "Absent" 以確保群組不存在。

trans-unit.source: Setting it to "Present" (the default value) ensures that the group exists.
trans-unit.target: 設定此群組為 "Present" (預設值)，可確保此群組存在。

trans-unit.source: Members
Use this property to replace the current group membership with the specified members.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，以指定的成員來取代目前的群組成員資格。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is an array of strings of the form *Domain*\\*UserName*.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性值為字串陣列，格式為 *Domain*\\*UserName*。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property in a configuration, do not use either the **MembersToExclude** or **MembersToInclude** property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在設定中設定這個屬性，請勿使用 **MembersToExclude** 或 **MembersToInclude** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will generate an error.
MembersToExclude
Use this property to remove members from the existing membership of the group.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性從群組的現有成員資格移除成員。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is an array of strings of the form *Domain*\\*UserName*.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性值為字串陣列，格式為 *Domain*\\*UserName*。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property in a configuration, do not use the **Members** property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在設定中設定這個屬性，請勿使用 **Members** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will generate an error.
MembersToInclude
Use this property to add members to the existing membership of the group.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性將成員新增至群組的現有成員資格。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is an array of strings of the form *Domain*\\*UserName*.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性值為字串陣列，格式為 *Domain*\\*UserName*。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property in a configuration, do not use the **Members** property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在設定中設定這個屬性，請勿使用 **Members** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will generate an error.
DependsOn
Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this resource is configured.
trans-unit.target: 表示必須先執行另一個資源的設定，再設定這個資源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is __ResourceName__ and its type is __ResourceType__, the syntax for using this property is `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"``.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一個想要執行的資源設定指令碼區塊的識別碼是 __ResourceName__，而它的類型是 __ResourceType__，則使用這個屬性的語法就是 `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`。

trans-unit.source: Example 1
The following example shows how to ensure that a group called "TestGroup" is absent.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何確定名為 "TestGroup" 的群組不存在。

trans-unit.source: Example 2

The following example shows how to add an Active Directory User to the local administrators group as part of a Multi-Machine Lab build where you are already using a PSCredential for the Local Adminstrator account.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何將 Active Directory 使用者以多電腦實驗室組建 (已經在其內使用本機系統管理員帳戶的 PSCredential) 的一部分，加入本機系統管理員群組。

trans-unit.source: As this is also used for the Domain Admin Account (after Domain promotion) we then need to convert this existing PSCredential to a Domain Friendly credential to enable us to add a Domain User to the Local Administrators Group on the Member server.
trans-unit.target: 在網域升級之後，其也會用於網域系統管理員帳戶，然後我們需要將此現有的 PSCredential 轉換為網域能記住的認證，我們如此才可將網域使用者加入成員伺服器上的本機系統管理員群組。
